quote_first: But all of his senses were heightened when the knock at the hotel door came. He looked at the clock:
quote_raw: But all of his senses were heightened when the knock at the hotel door came. He looked at the clock: 10:11 PM.
title: The Root of All Evil?
author: Ray Keating

quote_first: Therefore a sergeant called Trifonov had been on post all day or all week and then he had left at
quote_raw: Therefore a sergeant called Trifonov had been on post all day or all week and then he had left at eleven minutes past ten in the evening.
title: The Enemy
author: Lee Child
